author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: پروردگار از تو ميطلبيم كلّ را راه نمائى و هدايت فرمائى توئى قادر و توانا و عالم و بينا.
translation: We beg of Thee, O Providence, to show Thy way unto all men, and to guide them aright. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the Most Powerful, the All-Knowing, the All-Seeing.
